      • shouldRender

        public boolean shouldRender​(PotionEffect effect)
        If the Potion effect should be displayed in the players inventory
        参数:
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        返回:
        true to display it (default), false to hide it.

      • shouldRenderInvText

        public boolean shouldRenderInvText​(PotionEffect effect)
        If the standard PotionEffect text (name and duration) should be drawn when this potion is active.
        参数:
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        返回:
        true to draw the standard text

      • shouldRenderHUD

        public boolean shouldRenderHUD​(PotionEffect effect)
        If the Potion effect should be displayed in the player's ingame HUD
        参数:
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        返回:
        true to display it (default), false to hide it.

      • renderInventoryEffect

        @Deprecated
public void renderInventoryEffect​(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  PotionEffect effect,
                                  Minecraft mc)
        已过时。
        use renderInventoryEffect(PotionEffect, net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui, int, int, float)
        Called to draw the this Potion onto the player's inventory when it's active. This can be used to e.g. render Potion icons from your own texture.
        参数:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        mc - the Minecraft instance, for convenience

      • renderInventoryEffect

        public void renderInventoryEffect​(PotionEffect effect,
                                  Gui gui,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  float z)
        Called to draw the this Potion onto the player's inventory when it's active. This can be used to e.g. render Potion icons from your own texture.
        参数:
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        gui - the gui instance
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z level

      • renderHUDEffect

        @Deprecated
public void renderHUDEffect​(int x,
                            int y,
                            PotionEffect effect,
                            Minecraft mc,
                            float alpha)
        已过时。
        use renderHUDEffect(PotionEffect, net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui, int, int, float, float)
        Called to draw the this Potion onto the player's ingame HUD when it's active. This can be used to e.g. render Potion icons from your own texture.
        参数:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        mc - the Minecraft instance, for convenience
        alpha - the alpha value, blinks when the potion is about to run out

      • renderHUDEffect

        public void renderHUDEffect​(PotionEffect effect,
                            Gui gui,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            float z,
                            float alpha)
        Called to draw the this Potion onto the player's ingame HUD when it's active. This can be used to e.g. render Potion icons from your own texture.
        参数:
        effect - the active PotionEffect
        gui - the gui instance
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z level
        alpha - the alpha value, blinks when the potion is about to run out

      • getCurativeItems

        public java.util.List<ItemStack> getCurativeItems()
        Get a fresh list of items that can cure this Potion. All new PotionEffects created from this Potion will call this to initialize the default curative items
        返回:
        A list of items that can cure this Potion
        另请参阅:
        PotionEffect.getCurativeItems()

      • getGuiSortColor

        public int getGuiSortColor​(PotionEffect potionEffect)
        Used for determining PotionEffect sort order in GUIs. Defaults to the PotionEffect's liquid color.
        参数:
        potionEffect - the PotionEffect instance containing the potion
        返回:
        a value used to sort PotionEffects in GUIs

      • isBeneficial

        public boolean isBeneficial()
        Get if the potion is beneficial to the player. Beneficial potions are shown on the first row of the HUD

      • setBeneficial

        public Potion setBeneficial()
        Set that the potion is beneficial to the player. Beneficial potions are shown on the first row of the HUD

      • registerPotions

        public static void registerPotions()
